original_title: 古惑仔激情篇之洪興大飛哥
overview: The film centralizes on the storyline after Tai Fei (Anthony Wong) obtains branch leader status after Young and Dangerous 4. Tai Fei discovers he has a son, and soon realizes that he is a triad member involved in the Tung Sing gang which deals in narcotics.
title: The Legendary Tai Fei
